sentences.sContent: You need a long series of data to be able to discern such a trend.
sentences.sCn: 你需要一大串数据才能认清这一趋势。

sentences.sContent: We could just discern a town in the distance.
sentences.sCn: 我们依稀看到远处有一座城镇。

sentences.sContent: ...so being able to discern their deep structure is key...

remMethod.val: dis(分开) ＋ cern(区别) → 区别开来 → 识别， 认出

words.tran: 有辨识能力的；眼光敏锐的

trans.tranOther: to notice or understand something by thinking about it carefully
